title: CNBC Daily Open: Yellen changed the mood — again
description: The federal government is prepared to take additional actions if warranted, U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said.

title: TikTok CEO got grilled by lawmakers from both parties on whether the Chinese-owned app can protect American privacy
description: Shou Zi Chew's testimony did not seem to quell many concerns that lawmakers had about its connections to China or the adequacy of its risk mitigation plan.

title: Crypto is banned in China, but Binance employees and support volunteers tell people how to bypass the ban
description: The techniques have evolved to sidestep Binance's highly publicized know-your-customer controls, and focus on obscuring a user's country of origin.

title: Ex-Google employees' A.I. chatbot startup valued at $1 billion after Andreessen Horowitz funding
description: The founders of Character.AI helped create the architecture that used in popular AI chat products

title: Yellen says Treasury is ready to take 'additional actions if warranted' to stabilize banks
TikTok CEO says China-based ByteDance employees still have access to some U.S. data
description: TikTok CEO Shou Zi Chew told U.S. lawmakers that China-based employees at its parent company ByteDance may still have access to some U.S. data from the app.

title: China's liaisons with Russia are fueling an awkward split among European leaders
description: China's relationship with Russia is causing unease and division in the European Union.

title: In pictures: Protests take place across France after Macron forces through pension changes
description: Protesters marched around the country and strikes hit various sectors as Emmanuel Macron's televised interview failed to calm tensions.

title: OpenAI CEO admits a bug allowed some ChatGPT users to see others' conversation titles
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman says the company fixed a vulnerability that meant some users were able to see the titles of chats from other users.

title: Watch live: TikTok CEO testifies before House committee as potential U.S. ban looms
description: TikTok CEO Shou Zi Chew will testify before the House Energy and Commerce Committee this morning, as his company fights to stave off a potential ban in the U.S.

title: Ethereum co-founder says ether not a security, compares it to oil after regulator claims
description: Ethereum co-founder Joseph Lubin pushed back on the claim ether is a security Wednesday, saying he was "very confident" it wasn't one.

title: Block shares plunge after Hindenburg says Jack Dorsey's company facilitates fraud
Bank of England hikes interest rates by 25 basis points after inflation surprises
description: The Bank of England on Thursday hiked interest rates to their highest level since 2008 as it grapples with persistent high inflation.

title: Zurich to legalize consumption and sale of cannabis on trial basis
description: Switzerland has approved plans to legalize the sale and consumption of cannabis in Zurich in a trial designed to assess the economic and social benefits of regulating the drug.

title: Ukraine wants to win China over as Russia's invasion continues. Some say it shouldn't bother trying
description: Analysts say Kyiv could be wasting its time looking to Beijing for support as Russia's invasion continues into a second year.

title: Europe’s rush to LNG could turn into ‘world’s most expensive and unnecessary insurance policy'
description: Several European countries have announced new LNG projects or the expansion to existing ones in response to shutdown of Russian gas pipelines.

title: Swiss central bank hikes interest rates by 50 basis points despite Credit Suisse turmoil
description: The Swiss central bank has increased rates by 50 basis points, taking its policy rate to 1.5%.

title: China will make up nearly 40% of the rise in global oil demand in 2023, Wood Mackenzie says
description: The research firm said in a report it views China's reopening as the "single biggest demand driver" for a recovery in oil demand this year.

title: European lawmakers are quietly miffed at U.S. regulators over SVB's collapse
description: Regulators and officials across the European Union have been nervous about potential contagion to their own banking sector.

title: Swiss regulator says central bank loan to Credit Suisse justified AT1 bond writedown
description: Swiss regulator FINMA on Thursday defended its decision to instruct Credit Suisse to write down its AT1 bonds — a controversial part of the lender's emergency sale to UBS.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Jerome Powell flipped the script
description: The Federal Reserve hiked interest rates by a quarter point, as markets had expected. They didn't expect Powell's warnings on the economy.

title: Tencent's online ad revenue grows for the first time in more than a year
description: Chinese tech giant Tencent reported Wednesday better-than-expected quarterly revenue, helped by growth in ads within its growing "video accounts" business.

title: Relativity's first 3D-printed rocket launches successfully but fails to reach orbit
description: Relativity Space, a 3D-printing specialist, launched the inaugural flight of its Terran 1 rocket late on Wednesday night.

title: Bitcoin at $100,000? Insiders say the cryptocurrency could test new highs this year
description: The predictions of new record highs mark a more optimistic outlook than in January when industry executives told CNBC they expected 2023 to be a year of caution.

title: Wells Fargo lists financial instability as biggest economic risk post-Fed decision
description: "The Fed is not really giving enough credence to the idea that tighter credit means things weaken in a fairly quick manner," Wells Fargo's Mike Schumacher says.
